    • Method Detail

      • newBall

        public static Body newBall(Vector3 centerPos,
                           Vector3 vel,
                           double radius,
                           int rank,
                           double mass)
        Creates a new Body object representing a solid ball.
        Parameters:
        centerPos - position of the ball
        vel - initial velocity
        radius - radius of ball
        rank - Complexity of the spherical shape. Recommended values from 10-100.
        mass - mass of ball
        Returns:
        A Body object for the ball

      • newCuboid

        public static Body newCuboid(Vector3 centerPos,
                             Vector3 velocity,
                             double w,
                             double h,
                             double d,
                             double mass)
        Creates a new Body object representing a solid box/cuboid.
        Parameters:
        centerPos - initial position
        velocity - initial velocity of cuboid
        w - thickness in x direction
        h - thickness in y direction
        d - thickness in z direction
        mass - mass of cuboid
        Returns:
        A Body object for the cuboid

      • newWall

        public static Body newWall(Vector3 centerPos,
                           Vector3 dirArr,
                           double w,
                           double h)
        Creates a wall. This is a fixed planar rectangle.
        Parameters:
        centerPos - initial position of the center of the wall
        dirArr - direction the wall faces
        w - width of wall
        h - height of wall
        Returns:
        the wall Body object

      • newRoom

        public static List<Body> newRoom(Vector3 centerPos,
                                 double length,
                                 double width,
                                 double height)
        Creates a room with 5 walls (no ceiling). Each wall is a separate Body object.
        Parameters:
        centerPos - center point of the room
        length - x direction size
        width - y direction size
        height - z direction size
        Returns:
        a List of Body objects for each wall of the room
